title: Table Tennis
description: Fast-paced rallies and quick reflexes. Played with the Cal (UC Berkeley) table tennis club in college.
details: Nothing beats a competitive ping pong match!

title: Tennis
description: Love the strategy and athleticism of tennis. Favorite racket: Head Radical Pro. Favorite player: Roger Federer.
details: Great way to stay active and competitive!

title: Chess
description: Strategy, tactics, and endless possibilities. Challenge me online!

title: Board Games
description: From strategy games to party games, I enjoy the social aspect and creative gameplay.
